# Goal {#goal}
Cluster a small 4D volume (3D space Ã— time) into a few spatially coherent parcels, inspect the result, and export a NIfTI file.

# TL;DR {#tldr}
```r
# Create tiny synthetic data
mask <- NeuroVol(array(1, c(4,4,4)), NeuroSpace(c(4,4,4)))
vec  <- NeuroVec(array(rnorm(4*4*4*10), c(4,4,4,10)), NeuroSpace(c(4,4,4,10)))

# Minimal clustering: SNIC is fast on small data
result <- cluster4d(vec, mask, n_clusters = 3, method = "snic", max_iterations = 1)
```

# Setup {#setup}
```r
mask <- NeuroVol(array(1, c(4,4,4)), NeuroSpace(c(4,4,4)))
vec  <- NeuroVec(array(rnorm(4*4*4*10), c(4,4,4,10)), NeuroSpace(c(4,4,4,10)))
```

# Walkthrough {#walkthrough}
```r
result <- cluster4d(vec, mask, n_clusters = 3)
print(result)
summary(result)
plot(result)
```

# Export {#export}
```r
writeVol(result$clusvol, "clusters.nii.gz")
```
